# 二叉树类的题目

# 二叉树的最大深度 (opens new window)

// 分解子问题，动态规划的思路
function maxDepth (root) {
    if (root === null) return 0
    let leftCount = maxDepth(root.left)
    let rightCount = maxDepth(root.right)
    let max = Math.max(leftCount, rightCount)
    return max+1
}
1

8
// 回溯解法
let depth = 0
let res = 0
function maxDepth(root) {
    traverse(root)
    return res
}
function traverse(node) {
    if (node == null) {
        return
    }
    depth++
    res = Math.max(res, depth)
    traverse(node.left)
    traverse(node.right)
    depth--
}

##二叉树最大直径 (opens new window)

var diameterOfBinaryTree = function(root) {
    let res = 0
    function maxdepth(node) {
        if (node === null) return 0
        let leftCount = maxdepth(node.left)
        let rightCount = maxdepth(node.right)
        res = Math.max((leftCount + rightCount), res)
        return 1 + Math.max(leftCount, rightCount)
    }
    maxdepth(root)
    return res
};
